careeradvice.evaluation: Based on the system's analysis of your resume, your current position is <0>{{jobtitle}}</0>.
careeradvice.change direction: You match the qualifications of a <0>{{matched_job}}</0>. However, the position of a <0>{{matched_job}}</0> is being rapidly replaced in the changing market conditions. The market statistics shows that in order to stay on top of your game,  it is recommended that you shift your career direction towards <0>{{suggested_job}}</0>. Explore the following modules to learn how you can succeed as a <0>{{suggested_job}}</0> : <0>{{suggested_job_skills}}</0>.
careeradvice.improve: Your matching profession is a <0>{{matched_job}}</0>. The position is currently popular in the market, and the future can be expected. It is recommended that you can improve yourself with these aspects: <0>{{skills_needed}}</0>. Learning more knowledge and gaining more experience, so as to be promoted to a higher level of the position.
